name: Super Magnum Shooting
description:
This is a fan made mini-game references from Super Animal Royale's Super Shooting Gallery for fun!

Notes: First time to run may need to wait around 10 seconds

Goal

Get the highest score you could with a magnum gun within 1 min. Simply use mouse left click to shoot.

Shoot the mole crate could get rapid fire boost!

Why this game exists?

Super Animal Royale's Super Shooting Gallery is so funny! I want to make it be a mini arcade game for fun

Technically

If you like to see how it works, dig the source code from https://github.com/CocoaCaa/Super-Magnum-Shooting

Credits
  • Arts & Develop by CocoaCaa https://twitter.com/cocoa_caa
  • "Super Animal Royale" Sound Effects by Jake Butineau https://twitter.com/jakebutineau
More

I love to play Super Animal Royale and I would recommend it if you didn't play it before, this is an awesome, funny with cuties 2D MOBA game.

Disclaimer
